snippet: Thousands of scholars and others are objecting after the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign rescinded the offer to Steven G. Salaita.

byline.original: By SYDNI DUNN | THE CHRONICLE OF HIGHER EDUCATION

lead_paragraph: Thousands of scholars and others are objecting after the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign rescinded the offer to Steven G. Salaita.

headline.main: University’s Rescinding of Job Offer Prompts an Outcry
headline.print_headline: University's Rescinding of Job Offer Prompts an Outcry
